ä½¿ç”¨ Swift Package Manager å»ºç«‹ Command line tool

Command line tool æœ‰æ™‚å€™å¯ä»¥æ–¹ä¾¿çš„è™•ç†ä¸€äº›å¸¸è¦‹çš„ä»»å‹™ï¼Œæœ‰æ™‚å€™å¯ä»¥å°‡é–‹æ”¾ä¸­é‡åˆ°çš„ç‘£ç¢äº‹æƒ…è‡ªå‹•åŒ–è™•ç†ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ XcodeGenå°±æ˜¯ä¸€å€‹æœ‰è¶£çš„æ‡‰ç”¨ã€‚é€™ç¯‡æ–‡ç« å°‡æ•™ä½ å¦‚ä½•ä½¿ç”¨ Swift Package Manager(SPM) èˆ‡ Linux/Unix äº’å‹•ã€‚

å…ˆå‚™çŸ¥è­˜

  1. åŸºç¤ Swift èªæ³•çŸ¥è­˜ï¼Œè‹¥ä»¥ Swift.org çš„Language guide ç›®éŒ„ç‚ºæ¨™æº–ï¼Œå‰‡æ˜¯ The Basic è‡³ Methodsã€‚
  2. åŸºç¤ Swift Package.init åƒæ•¸ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œå¦‚ name, dependencies, targetsã€‚
  3. åŸºç¤ Linux èªæ³•çŸ¥è­˜ï¼Œå¦‚ ls -alR, Date, whoamiã€‚

å»ºç«‹å¯åŸ·è¡Œçš„SPM - Hello world

æˆ‘å€‘å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ Swift package manager ä¾†å»ºç«‹ä¸€å€‹æ–°çš„ Package projectã€‚ å¦‚æœä½ å° terminal ç†Ÿæ‚‰çš„è©±ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é–±è®€æ›´è©³ç´°çš„æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š Swift-package-manager/Usage.mdã€‚

$ swift package init --type executable --name helloworld

é€™æ®µæŒ‡ä»¤åŸ·è¡Œäº†ä¸€ä¸‹äº‹æƒ…ï¼š åœ¨ç•¶å‰ç›®éŒ„å»ºç«‹ä¸€å€‹åç‚º helloworld çš„ å¯åŸ·è¡Œçš„Swift packageã€‚

ä½ å¯ä»¥çœ‹åˆ°ç•¶å‰ç›®éŒ„å»ºç«‹äº†ä¸€äº›æª”æ¡ˆï¼Œä¸‹é¢æ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨ tree çš„æª”æ¡ˆå¤¾çµæ§‹ï¼š

.

å¦‚æ­¤ä¸€ä¾†å°±å®ŒæˆåŸºç¤çš„ Command line tool äº†ï¼

Package.swift å–ä»£äº† .xcodeproj

è‹¥æ˜¯ä½ æœ‰ Xcode 11, å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥æ‰“é–‹ Package.swift å°±æœƒè‡ªå‹• link æ‰€æœ‰æª”æ¡ˆä¸¦å»ºç«‹ .swiftpm

å¯ä»¥çœ‹åˆ° Package.swift æˆç‚ºåœ¨ XCode çš„ç¬¬ä¸€å€‹æª”æ¡ˆï¼Œä»¥å¾€ç†Ÿæ‚‰çš„ .xcodeprojä¸è¦‹äº†ã€‚

åœ¨åŸ·è¡Œæª”ä½¿ç”¨ç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹å‡½å¼åº«

åœ¨é€™è£æˆ‘å€‘ç‚º helloworld å¢åŠ è®€å– arguments çš„åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œæˆ‘å€‘å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨å…¶ä»–å·²ç¶“å®Œå–„çš„ç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹å‡½å¼åº«ï¼Œé€™æ¬¡æˆ‘å€‘ä½¿ç”¨ SPMUtilityï¼Œ é€™æ˜¯ä¾†è‡ª Apple çš„é–‹æºå°ˆæ¡ˆï¼ŒSPM å¯ä»¥é€é Git ç›®éŒ„çš„è®€å–ï¼ŒåŸ·è¡Œå¥—ä»¶ç®¡ç†ä¸¦å®‰è£åˆ°å°ˆæ¡ˆä¸­ã€‚æˆ‘å€‘åœ¨ Package.swift ä¸­å¥—ç”¨ä»¥ä¸‹çš„ä¿®æ”¹ï¼š

// swift-tools-version:5.1

import PackageDescription

let package = Package(
	name: "helloworld",
	dependencies: [
		.package(url: "https://github.com/apple/swift-package-manager.git", from: "0.1.0")
	],
	targets: [
		.target(
			name: "helloworld",
			dependencies: ["SPMUtility"]),
		.testTarget(
			name: "helloworldTests",
			dependencies: ["helloworld"]),
	]
)

å› ç‚ºå‡½å¼åº«çš„å¤§å°è¼ƒå¤§ï¼Œå»ºè­°ç¶²è·¯é€Ÿåº¦è¼ƒæ…¢çš„è®€è€…åœ¨é€™è£å…ˆå›åˆ° terminal åŸ·è¡Œ swift buildã€‚

è¦æ³¨æ„ä¸€æ—¦ç·¨è¼¯ Package.swift æª”å¾Œï¼Œå¿…é ˆä½¿ç”¨ä¸»å‹•å„²å­˜è®Šæ›´ï¼ŒXCode æ‰æœƒæ›´æ–°å°ˆæ¡ˆï¼Œæˆ‘å€‘å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ File > Save ä¾†ä¸»å‹•å„²å­˜ã€‚

ä½¿ç”¨ SPMUtility è®€å– Arguments èˆ‡æ”¯æ´å…¶ä»–æ‡‰ç”¨ã€‚

ç‚ºäº†å¯¦ç¾è®€å– Arguments çš„åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œæˆ‘å€‘è¦åˆ° main.swift ç·¨å¯«ç¨‹å¼ç¢¼ï¼

é¦–å…ˆï¼Œé€šé import Foundationï¼Œæˆ‘å€‘å–å¾—ä½¿ç”¨è€…è¼¸å…¥çš„ Argumentsã€‚

import Foundation
import SPMUtility

let arguments = ProcessInfo.processInfo.arguments[1...]

print("Hello, world!")

ä½¿ç”¨ ArgumentParser ä½¿ Swift å¯ä»¥è®€å– Argumentsã€‚

let parser = ArgumentParser(usage: "<options>", overview: "A Swift command-line tool to say hello")
let nameArgument = parser.add(option: "--name", shortName: "-n", kind: String.self, usage: "The name to greeting")
let repeatArgument = parser.add(option: "--repeat", shortName: "-r", kind: Int.self, usage: "The repeat count of Hello")

æˆ‘å€‘å»ºç«‹äº†å–®ä¸€ Parserï¼ŒåŠ å…¥å…©å€‹å¯ç”¨çš„åƒæ•¸ï¼Œ--name å’Œ --repeatï¼Œé€é shortName çš„åƒæ•¸å»ºç«‹å„è‡ªçš„åˆ¥åï¼Œkind å‰‡å»ºç«‹æŒ‡å®šçš„ Swift å‹åˆ¥ã€‚

æ¥ä¸‹ä¾†æˆ‘å€‘é€éé‚è¼¯å®Œæˆé€™å€‹æ‡‰ç”¨ç¨‹å¼ã€‚

import SPMUtility
import Foundation

let arguments = ProcessInfo.processInfo.arguments[1...]

let parser = ArgumentParser(usage: "<options>", overview: "A Swift command-line tool to say hello")
let nameArgument = parser.add(option: "--name", shortName: "-n", kind: String.self, usage: "The name to greeting")
let repeatArgument = parser.add(option: "--repeat", shortName: "-r", kind: Int.self, usage: "The repeat count of Hello")

do {
    let parsedArguments = try parser.parse(Array(arguments))
    let name = parsedArguments.get(nameArgument) ?? "world"
    var repeatCount = parsedArguments.get(repeatArgument) ?? 0
	repeatCount = repeatCount > 0 ? repeatCount : 1
	var helloRepeat = ["Hello"]
	for _ in 1..<repeatCount {
		helloRepeat.append("hello")
	}
	let holloSentence = helloRepeat.joined(separator: ", ")
    print("\(holloSentence), \(name)")
} catch {
    print("helloworld greeting failed: \(error)")
}

ç¾åœ¨ï¼Œæˆ‘å€‘ä¾†æ¸¬è©¦çœ‹çœ‹ï¼åœ¨ terminal è£¡åŸ·è¡Œä»¥ä¸‹æŒ‡ä»¤ï¼Œä½ æ‡‰è©²çœ‹åˆ°æ‡‰ç”¨ç¨‹å¼çš„çµæœã€‚

$ swift run helloworld --name yu --repeat 3
Hello, hello, hello, yu

ArgumentParser åŒæ™‚ä¹Ÿæä¾› --help çš„åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚

$ swift run swift run helloworld --help
OVERVIEW: A Swift command-line tool to say hello

USAGE: helloworld <options>

OPTIONS:
  --name, -n     The title to greeting
  --repeat, -r   The repeat count of Hello
  --help         Display available options

å°‡ SPM æ‰“åŒ…ä¸¦å®‰è£åˆ° Unix ä¸Š

åœ¨ç¶“æ­·äº†å„ç¨®æ¸¬è©¦å¾Œï¼Œæˆ‘å€‘çš„ helloworld å·²ç¶“å¯ä»¥ä½œç‚ºä¸€å€‹æ—¥å¸¸çš„ä½¿ç”¨å·¥å…·ï¼Œé€éä»¥ä¸‹çš„æ–¹å¼ï¼Œå°‡åŸ·è¡Œæª”å®‰è£åˆ° terminal ä¸Šã€‚

iOS 13 é‡å°åŠ å¯†çš„frameworkï¼šCryptoKit

ä»¥å¾€è¦ä½¿ç”¨åŠ å¯†çš„å‡½å¼æ™‚ï¼Œéœ€è¦æ¥è§¸ C apiï¼Œä¾ç…§ StackOverflow ä¸Šçš„è§£ç­”ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ CC_MD5

åœ¨ C èªè¨€ éœ€ #include <openssl/md4.h>

StackOverflow link :https://stackoverflow.com/a/32166735/10172299

iOS çš„ CryptoKit

import CryptoKit

var md5 = Insecure.MD5()

md5.update(data: "1234567890".data(using: .utf8)!)

let digest: Insecure.MD5.Digest = md5.finalize()

print(digest)
// MD5 digest: e807f1fcf82d132f9bb018ca6738a19f

è©³ç´°çš„ WWDC

WWDC 2019 - session 709 - Cryptography and Your Apps: https://developer.apple.com/videos/play/wwdc2019/709/

è¶…ç´šè¶…å¥½ç”¨çš„è˜‹æœé›»è…¦å¯†æŠ€ (ä¸€) æ–‡å­—ç·¨è¼¯ç¯‡

æˆ‘èªè­˜å¾ˆå¤šæœ‹å‹å› ç‚ºè¦ºå¾— macOS åœ¨ä½¿ç”¨ä¸Šæ¯” Windows æ–¹ä¾¿è€Œè²·äº†ä¸€å° MacBook, ä½†æ˜¯ç”±æ–¼å°ä½œæ¥­ç³»çµ±çš„æ•´é«”é‚è¼¯ä¸ç†Ÿ, å¸¸å¸¸æœƒæœ‰è¨±å¤šå•é¡Œè«‹æ•™. ä¾‹å¦‚è¼¸å…¥æ³•åˆ‡æ›, å¥½ç”¨çš„å·¥å…·ç¨‹å¼ç­‰ç­‰. é€™æ¬¡ä»‹ç´¹æˆ‘çš„ macOS æ—¥å¸¸ä½¿ç”¨çš„æŠ€å·§èˆ‡ä¸€äº›é…ç½®. é€™æ¬¡æ˜¯åœ¨ macOS 10.15.2 çš„ç’°å¢ƒä¸‹æ‰€ä¸‹çš„æŒ‡ä»¤. æ–‡ç« æœ‰æä¾›ä¸€äº›ç·´ç¿’çš„æ–¹å¼, å¦‚æœè¦ºå¾—ä¸éŒ¯å¯ä»¥ç•™è¨€çµ¦æˆ‘ä¸€äº›å›é¥‹.

æ–‡å­—ç·¨è¼¯æ–¹å¼

1. Windows çš„å‘å¾Œåˆªé™¤

åœ¨ä¸­æ–‡èˆ‡è‹±æ–‡ä¸€èˆ¬çš„æ–¹å¼ä¸‹, delete çš„æ–‡å­—åˆªé™¤æ–¹å‘æ˜¯å‘å·¦åˆªé™¤, ä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯æ–‡å­—æ®µè½çš„å‰æ–¹. åœ¨ Windows ä¸Š, å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ DEL ä¾†å‘å·¦åˆªé™¤, è€Œ macOS çš„å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ fn + delete ä¾†é”åˆ°åŒæ¨£æ•ˆæœ.

2. å¿«é€Ÿç§»å‹•æ–‡å­—æŒ‡æ¨™

å¾ˆå¤šæ™‚å€™æœƒæœ‰ç§»å‹•æ–‡å­—æŒ‡æ¨™ä¸¦ç¹¼çºŒæ‰“å­—çš„æƒ…æ³ç™¼ç”Ÿ, åœ¨ macOS å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ option + å·¦å³ç®­é ­, ä¾†ä¾ç…§æ–‡å­—å¿«é€Ÿç§»å‹•, åœ¨å–®è¡Œçš„æ–‡å­—ä¿®æ”¹å¯ä»¥å¿«é€Ÿè·³èºæ–‡å­—æ®µè½. å¦‚æœæƒ³å¿«é€Ÿç§»å‹•åˆ°å–®è¡Œçš„æœ€å‰/æœ€å¾Œ, å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ command + å·¦å³ç®­é ­ ä¾†ç§»å‹•, æˆ‘åœ¨æ‰“é€™å€‹æ®µè½çš„æ™‚å€™å°±ä½¿ç”¨å¾ˆå¤šæ¬¡é€™å€‹æŠ€å·§, éå¸¸å¯¦ç”¨.

3. æ®µè½é¸å–æ–¹å¼

å¯ä»¥ç”¨éµç›¤å’Œè§¸ç¢°ç‰ˆå¿«é€Ÿå®Œæˆæ–‡å­—é¸å–çš„ä»»å‹™.

éµç›¤ä½¿ç”¨é¡ä¼¼ä¸Šé¢ç§»å‹•æ–‡å­—æŒ‡æ¨™çš„æ–¹å¼, ä¸éé€™å€‹è¦åŠ ä¸Š shift, å¯ä»¥åœ¨æ®µè½ä¸­é–“ä½¿ç”¨ command + shift + å·¦å³ç®­é ­, é¸å–ä¸€åŠçš„æ–‡å­—.

è§¸å±ç‰ˆå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ 3 æŒ‡ç§»å‹•çš„æ–¹å¼é¸å–, é€™åŠŸèƒ½éœ€è¦ä¸€ç³»åˆ—çš„è¨­å®š: å¦‚æœä½ çš„ Mac é…å‚™ã€Œ åŠ›åº¦è§¸æ§è»Œè·¡æ¿ ã€ï¼Œé–‹å•Ÿä¸‰æŒ‡æ‹–æ›³åŠŸèƒ½çš„æ­¥é©Ÿå¦‚ä¸‹ã€‚

  1. æ‰“é–‹ã€Œç³»çµ±åå¥½è¨­å®šã€çš„ã€Œè¼”åŠ©ä½¿ç”¨ã€ã€‚
  2. å¾å·¦å´é¸é …ä¸­é¸æ“‡ã€Œæ»‘é¼ èˆ‡è§¸æ§å¼è»Œè·¡æ¿ã€ã€‚
  3. æŒ‰ä¸€ä¸‹ã€Œè§¸æ§å¼è»Œè·¡æ¿é¸é …ã€ã€‚
  4. å‹¾é¸ã€Œå•Ÿç”¨æ‹–ç§»ã€æ—çš„å‹¾é¸æ¡†ã€‚
  5. å¾ç›¸é—œçš„å½ˆå‡ºå¼é¸å–®ä¸­ï¼Œé¸æ“‡ã€Œä¸‰æŒ‡æ‹–æ›³ã€åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œæ—é‚Šå°±æœƒå‡ºç¾å‰”è™Ÿã€‚
  6. æŒ‰ä¸€ä¸‹ã€Œç¢ºå®šã€ã€‚

4. åƒ iPhone ä¸€æ¨£ç”¨èªªè©±ä¾†æ‰“å­— (è½å¯«)

åœ–ç‰‡ä¾†è‡ª https://support.apple.com/zh-tw/guide/mac-help/mh40584/mac
å¯ä»¥åœ¨ä»»ä½•å¯è¼¸å…¥çš„ä½ç½®è½å¯«æ–‡å­—. macOS æœƒå°‡æ‚¨çš„å­—è©å‚³é€è‡³ Apple ä¼ºæœå™¨é€²è¡Œåˆ†æä¸¦è½‰æ›ç‚ºæ–‡å­—, ä¹Ÿå› æ­¤åªèƒ½åœ¨æœ‰ç¶²è·¯çš„ä½¿ç”¨ä½¿ç”¨. é–‹å•Ÿè½å¯«çš„æ­¥é©Ÿå¦‚ä¸‹:
  1. é–‹å•Ÿã€Œç³»çµ±åå¥½è¨­å®šã€çš„ã€Œéµç›¤ã€.

ä»¥ä¸Šæ˜¯ä¸€äº›æˆ‘å¸¸ç”¨æˆ–æ˜¯æœ‰è¶£çš„ macOS æ–‡å­—ç§˜æŠ€, æ­¡è¿ç•™è¨€å‘Šè¨´æˆ‘ä½ çš„æƒ³æ³•. åƒè€ƒè³‡è¨Š:

item.title: ä½¿ç”¨ Async è¼•é‡éåŒæ­¥å¥—ä»¶éˆå¼èª¿ç”¨éåŒæ­¥è¡Œç‚º
item.description: Async explain and try to extend it
item.content:encoded:
ä½¿ç”¨ Async è¼•é‡éåŒæ­¥å¥—ä»¶éˆå¼èª¿ç”¨éåŒæ­¥è¡Œç‚º

Async: github.com/duemunk/Async

2019 å¹´ä»‹ç´¹ Combine æ™‚ 2019éµäººè³½ä»‹ç´¹ Combine ç³»åˆ—, å°æ–¼é€£çºŒçš„éåŒæ­¥äº‹ä»¶çš„èª¿ç”¨, æˆ‘å€‘æœƒé‡åˆ°å›å‘¼åœ°ç„(Callback hell), ä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯å¤šç­†å…·ç›¸ä¾çš„éåŒæ­¥æ­¥é©ŸéŸ¿æ‡‰è¾¦æ³•.

## Async çš„è§£æ³• ç›¸è¼ƒæ–¼åŸæœ¬çš„ DispatchQueue çš„ç‰ˆæœ¬:

DispatchQueue.global(qos: .userInitiated).async {
    let value = 10
    DispatchQueue.global(qos: .background).async {
        let text = "Score: \(value)"
        DispatchQueue.main.async {
            label.text = text
        }
    }
}

Async
.userInitiated { 10 }
.background { "Score: \($0)"}
.main { label.text = $0 }

Asyncå¾ˆåƒç€‘å¸ƒä¸€æ¨£, ç”±ä¸Šè‡³ä¸‹çš„æ€è€ƒéåŒæ­¥çš„åŸ·è¡Œæµç¨‹.

Async æ²’æœ‰å°éŒ¯èª¤æ‹‹å‡ºè™•ç† throws

åœ¨ç ”ç©¶äº†ä¸€æ®µæ™‚é–“ç™¼ç¾, Async å¾ˆå¯æƒœçš„æ²’æœ‰å° Error handle åšè™•ç†, æ±ºå®šç ”ç©¶äº†ä¸€ä¸‹, ä¿®æ”¹éƒ¨åˆ†çš„ç¨‹å¼ç¢¼, fork repo.

private class Reference<T> {
        var value: T?
/*æ–°å¢*/    var error:Error? 
/*æ–°å¢*/    var queue:GCD?   
}

public struct AsyncBlock<In, Out> {

    ...


    private static func async<O>(after seconds: Double? = nil,
                                 block: @escaping () throws -> O,
                                 queue: GCD) -> AsyncBlock<Void, O> {
        let reference = Reference<O>()
/*æ–°å¢*/    reference.queue = queue
        let block = DispatchWorkItem(block: {
/*æ–°å¢*/        do {
/*æ–°å¢*/            reference.value = try block()
/*æ–°å¢*/        }catch {
/*æ–°å¢*/            reference.error = error
/*æ–°å¢*/        }
        })
      ...
    }
 
    private func chain<O>(after seconds: Double? = nil,
                          block chainingBlock: @escaping (Out) throws -> O,
                          queue: GCD) -> AsyncBlock<Out, O> {
        let reference = Reference<O>()
/*æ–°å¢*/            reference.queue = queue
        let dispatchWorkItem = DispatchWorkItem(block: {
/*æ–°å¢*/        guard let value = self.output_.value else {
/*æ–°å¢*/            return reference.error = self.output_.error!
/*æ–°å¢*/        }
/*æ–°å¢*/        do {
/*æ–°å¢*/            reference.value = try chainingBlock(value)
/*æ–°å¢*/        } catch {
/*æ–°å¢*/            reference.error = error
/*æ–°å¢*/        }
        })

    ...
    }

...

}

å¦‚æ­¤ä¸€ä¾†, å°±å¯ä»¥å° AsyncBlock æ‹“å±• catch(_:)

/*æ–°å¢*/
@discardableResult
public func `catch`(respondBlock: @escaping (Error) -> Void) -> AsyncBlock<In,Out> {
    let queue = output_.queue!.queue
    let c = {
        if let error = self.output_.error {
            respondBlock(error)
        }
    }
    let item = DispatchWorkItem(block: c)
    block.notify(queue: queue, execute: item)
    return self
}

å¯¦ä½œå–®å…ƒæ¸¬è©¦:

func testAsyncMainWithCatch() {
    let expectation = self.expectation(description: "Expected on main queue")
    var calledStuffAfterSinceAsync = false
    Async.main {
        try self.alwaysError()
    }.catch { (error) in
        #if targetEnvironment(simulator)
        XCTAssert(Thread.isMainThread, "Should be on main thread (simulator)")
        #else
        XCTAssertEqual(qos_class_self(), qos_class_main())
        #endif
        XCTAssert(calledStuffAfterSinceAsync, "Should be async")
        expectation.fulfill()
    }
    calledStuffAfterSinceAsync = true
    waitForExpectations(timeout: timeMargin, handler: nil)
}

ä»¥ä¸Š, æ–¼ fork çš„ GitHub project å…§æŒçºŒè£œä¸Š test case! GitHub é€£çµ: https://github.com/ytyubox/Async

item.title: iOS å¯¦æ©Ÿæ¸¬è©¦éœ‡å‹•
item.content:encoded:
iOS å¯¦æ©Ÿæ¸¬è©¦éœ‡å‹•

æ¯æ¬¡æ™‚é–“ä¸å¯æ”¹ï¼Œæœ€å°é–“éš” 0.5 ç§’

import AudioToolbox

AudioServicesPlayAlertSound(SystemSoundID(kSystemSoundID_Vibrate))

å¥—ç”¨ Swift 5.1 çš„ Property Wrapper

import AudioToolbox

@propertyWrapper
struct SoundId {
    typealias Value = UInt32
    var projectedValue: SystemSoundID
    var wrappedValue: Value {
        didSet {
            projectedValue = .init(self.wrappedValue)
        }
    }
    
    init(wrappedValue: Value) {
        self.projectedValue = SystemSoundID(wrappedValue)
        self.wrappedValue = wrappedValue
    }
}

class SOMECLASS {
    @SoundId var currentSystemEffect = kSystemSoundID_Vibrate
    
    func playSound() {
        AudioServicesPlaySystemSound(self.$currentSystemEffect)
    }
}

import Foundation
import Publish
import Plot

// This type acts as the configuration for your website.
struct Publishdemo: Website {
    enum SectionID: String, WebsiteSectionID {
        case posts
    }

    struct ItemMetadata: WebsiteItemMetadata {
        // Add any site-specific metadata that you want to use here.
    }

    // Update these properties to configure your website:

    var name = "Publishdemo"
    var description = "A description of Publishdemo"
    var language: Language { .english }
    var imagePath: Path? { nil }
}

try Publishdemo().publish(withTheme: .foundation)
